name: $category
desc: Returns: Indicates a category the goal falls within.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates a category the goal falls within.

name: $description
desc: Returns: Human-readable and/or coded description of a specific desired objective of care, such as "control blood pressure" or "negotiate an obstacle course" or "dance with child at wedding".

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Human-readable and/or coded description of a specific desired objective of care, such as "control blood pressure" or "negotiate an obstacle course" or "dance with child at wedding".

name: $priority
desc: Returns: Identifies the expected level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the defined goal.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the expected level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the defined goal.

name: $start
desc: Returns: The event after which the goal should begin being pursued.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The event after which the goal should begin being pursued.

name: $addresses
desc: Returns: Identifies problems, conditions, issues, or concerns the goal is intended to address.

name: $addaddresses
desc: Identifies problems, conditions, issues, or concerns the goal is intended to address.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies problems, conditions, issues, or concerns the goal is intended to address.

name: $documentation
desc: Returns: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the goal that provide further supporting information about the goal. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

name: $adddocumentation
desc: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the goal that provide further supporting information about the goal. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the goal that provide further supporting information about the goal. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

name: $target
desc: Returns: Indicates what should be done and within what timeframe.

name: $addtarget
desc: Indicates what should be done and within what timeframe.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates what should be done and within what timeframe.
